about_the_game:
check out our new game and dont forget to Wishlist!




Features:


  • Japanese voice acting by professionals
  • Unique puzzles that will test your intellect, leading you closer to the truth behind your brother's disappearance.
  • You will play as 3 different characters, without being notified about the character changes, you'll have to figure it out on your own
  • Walking Simulator - Immerse yourself in a chilling world inspired by Japanese urban legends, brought to life with stunning visuals and atmospheric audio design.
  • Will you find your brother and escape the clutches of Jorogumo, or will you succumb to the terrors that await within the lost shadows of the forest? Uncover the truth and face your deepest fears in this haunting tale.

Playtime: 2 - 4 Hours

Join Our Discord:

Jorogumo

Playing as a desperate man consumed by the search for his missing brother, you must navigate through dense foliage, treacherous terrain, and hidden obstacles. Engage in intricate puzzles, decipher cryptic clues, and brave the unknown to uncover the truth that lurks within the shadows of the forest.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Jorōgumo - じょろうぐも

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a perilous journey through the haunting depths of the forest in Jorogumo, a gripping stealth and puzzle game. When your brother vanishes in the eerie woods, you must summon your courage and venture into the heart of darkness to unravel the enigma surrounding the ancient legend of Jorogumo.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Korean, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
